name: Divine Sense
trigger: when you open your awareness with a holy symbol
effects: for the next 10 minutes or until you have the Incapacitated condition, you know the location and creature type of any Celestial, Fiend, or Undead within 60 feet
within the same radius, you detect the presence of any place or object that is consecrated or desecrated (as with Hallow)
